attributes.action: Ensure the appropriate Senior Government Minister attends the 25th Anniversary commemorations of the Falklands Islands Conflict
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In April 1982 a battle for sovereignty took place in the Falkland Islands where Her Majesty's aremed forces re-gained sovereignty from the Argentinians.  Many men lost their lives and others were seriously injured during this conflict.  In order to show its gratitude and RESPECT, Her Majesty's Government must ensure that a senior member of parliament attends the island ceremony to commemorate this conflict and not use the excuse that the weather will be UNPLEASANT and CHILLY - probably the same as it was for the armed forces when the conflict took place.
